EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the field that a request was received and who is assigned.
EmailTemplate.name: WRF Receipt Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF Received: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your Work Request submission for {!Case.Account}. We appreciate the opportunity to work with you.
Please note our standard turnaround time is 7 to 10 business days to complete this type of request.
Anticipated Completion Date:
Region: {!Case.Region__c} Your Support # is {!Case.CaseNumber} You can click here to view the request in Salesforce.com.
Note: Manager names may appear in the Pricing or Development task assignment initially. The specific analyst or CDM assigned will be visible within 24 hrs.
Thank you,
BSD Bids
